subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: After Frankie Hejduk and Landon Donovan scored, the United States again nearly frittered away its lead and a spot in the Concacaf Gold Cup final.
snippet: After Frankie Hejduk and Landon Donovan scored, the United States again nearly frittered away its lead and a spot in the Concacaf Gold Cup final.
